This division includes silviculture and the production of roundwood as well as the extraction and gathering of wild-growing non-wood forest products. Besides the production of timber, forestry activities result in products that undergo little processing, for example, firewood, charcoal or roundwood used in an unprocessed form (such as pit-props or pulpwood). These activities can be carried out in natural, semi-natural or planted forests.
Excluded is further processing of wood beginning with sawmilling and planing of wood, see division 16.

Ez az gazat magban foglalja az erdmvelst, valamint a fafeldolgozshoz szksges hengeres fa termelst, s az erdben vadon term egyb nvnyi termkek kinyerst, gyjtst. A fakitermelsen kvl az erdgazdlkodsi tevkenysg olyan termket is eredmnyezhet, ami kismrtk feldolgozsi folyamat eredmnye: pl. tzifa, faszn, feldolgozatlan rnkfa (mint pldul tmasz, oszlop, paprfa). Ezeket a tevkenysgeket a termszetes, a flig termszetes s az ltetett erdkben egyarnt lehet vgezni.
Nem ebbe az gazatba tartozik: - fa tovbbi megmunklsa, pl. frszelse, gyalulsa, lsd: 16 gazat
This division includes the collection, treatment and distribution of water to the end user. Collection of water from various sources, as well as distribution by various means is included.
Ebbe az gazatba tartozik a vzkivtel, -kezels s a vzellts biztostsa a vgfelhasznlk rszre. Idetartozik mg a vzkivtel klnbz forrsokbl s annak elosztsa klnbz eszkzkkel.

Ebbe az gazatba tartozik a knyv, brosra, szrlap sztr, lexikon, atlasz, trkp s adatot tartalmaz egyb trkp kiadsa; jsg, folyirat s idszaki kiadvny kiadsa; cmjegyzk, levelezlista s egyb kiadvny kiadsa, valamint a szoftverkiads.
A kiadi tevkenysgbe tartozik a tartalomhoz (informcis termkhez) kapcsold szerzi jogok (copyrights) megszerzse, tovbb az ilyen tartalom elrhetv ttele a nagykznsg szmra azltal, hogy megszervezi, vagy rszt vesz e tartalom klnbz formban trtn sokszorostsban s terjesztsben. A kiadk a sajt maguk ltal ltrehozott vagy a tulajdonukban lv tartalmat kiadjk s terjesztik vagy a tartalomra vonatkoz terjesztsi jogot (licencet) rtkestik. A kiads minden lehetsges formja (nyomtatott, digitlis, analg vagy brmilyen ms formban trtn kiads) s a szerzi kiadsi tevkenysg ebbe az gazatba tartozik, kivve a mozgkp- s zenemkiadst.
Ebbe az gazatba tartozik a tartalom, pldul szoftver s knyv tartalomkiad ltali kzvettse (streaming).
Nem ebbe az gazatba tartozik a mozgkp, vide s film gyrtsa, a zenemkiads s az eredeti (master) hangfelvtel gyrtsa, lsd: 59-es gazat.
Nem ebbe az gazatba tartozik tovbb a kiadk ltal a tartalom sugrzsra s terjesztsre vonatkoz jog megszerzse (lsd: 60 gazat), a szmtgpes programozsi tevkenysg (lsd: 62 gazat), a nyomdai tevkenysg (lsd: 18.1 algazat) s a rgztett mdia (fizikai adathordozra rgztett hang- s videfelvtelek) tmeges sokszorostsa (lsd: 18.20).

This division includes the publishing of books, brochures, leaflets, dictionaries, encyclopaedias, atlases, maps and charts; the publishing of newspapers, journals and periodicals; the publishing of directories and mailing lists, and other publishing (including software publishing).
Publishing includes the acquisition of copyrights to content (information products) and making this content available to the general public by engaging in (or arranging for) the reproduction and distribution of this content in various forms. Publishers may license rights to others to distribute their content, or they may publish and distribute content they create or own. All the feasible forms of publishing (in print, digital, analogue, or any other form) and self-publishing activities are included in this division, except publishing of motion pictures and music.
This division covers the streaming of content (for example, software and books), by content publishers.
This division excludes the production of motion pictures, videos and movies, the publishing of music and the production of original (sound) master recordings, see division 59.
Also excluded are obtaining rights from publishers to broadcast and distribute content (see division 60), computer programming activities (see division 62), printing (see group 18.1) and the mass reproduction of recorded media (see class 18.20).

This division includes the activities of smelting and/or refining ferrous and non-ferrous metals from ore, pig, metal waste or scrap, using electro-metallurgic and other metallurgical process techniques.
This division also includes the manufacture of metal alloys and super-alloys by introducing other chemical elements to pure metals. The output of smelting and refining, usually in ingot form, is used in rolling, drawing and extruding operations to make, for example, plate, sheet, strip, bars, rods, wire or tubes, pipes and hollow profiles and other basic metal products, and in molten form to make castings.

Ez az gazat tartalmazza a vas- s a nemvas fmek ellltst, finomtst rcbl, nyersvasbl, fmhulladkbl vagy cskavasbl, elektrokohszati vagy ms kohszati eljrsokkal.
Ebbe az gazatba tartozik mg: - az tvzet s a szupertvzet gyrtsa is, ms elem hozzadsval tiszta fmekhez Az olvaszts s finomts vgtermkt - ltalban nttt termk formjban - hengerelssel, hzssal s extrudlssal pl. lap, lemez, szalag, rd, huzal vagy cs s zrt szelvny ellltsra hasznljk; ntssel ntvnyt, tovbb ms fmalapanyagot ksztenek belle.

This section includes a wide range of activities to meet varied cultural, sports and recreational interests of their customers, including live performances, entertainment, the operation of cultural and natural heritage sites, and gambling.
This section also includes services that facilitate entertainment events and live performances.

Ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba a nagykznsg ignyeinek megfelelen klnfle kulturlis, sport- s szabadids tevkenysgek szles sklja tartozik, belertve az l eladst, a szrakoztatst, a kulturlis s termszeti rksgek helyszneinek zemeltetst, valamint a szerencsejtkokat.
Ez a nemzetgazdasgi g olyan szolgltatsokat is fellel, amelyek szrakoztat rendezvnyek s l eladsok ltrejttt teszik lehetv.

This section includes financial service activities, insurance activities and financial auxiliary activities, regardless of the technologies used to conduct these activities or support services.
Three principal types of activities are classified in this section: raising, obtaining and providing funding (division 64); pooling of risk by underwriting insurance and annuities (division 65); and providing specialised services facilitating or supporting financial or insurance service activities (division 66).
This section also includes activities of holding assets, such as the activities of holding companies and financing conduits and the activities of trusts, funds and similar financial entities (division 64), as well as the activities of reinsurance and pension funds (division 65).
This section excludes support activities to financial services that are not financial in nature (for example, IT services supporting banking activities).

Ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik a pnzgyi kzvett tevkenysg, a biztostsi s a pnzgyi kiegszt tevkenysgek, az e tevkenysgek elltshoz hasznlt technolgitl fggetlenl.
A tevkenysgek 3 alaptpusa tartozik ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba: a pnzforrsok gyjtse s nyjtsa a 64-es gazatba, a kockzatmegoszts biztostsok ktsvel s jradkokkal a 65-s gazatba, specilis szolgltatsok nyjtsa, amelyek elsegtik vagy tmogatjk a pnzgyi vagy biztostsi szolgltatsi tevkenysgeket a 66-os gazatba.
Ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik mg a pnzgyi vagyonkezelshez kapcsold tevkenysg, gymint a vagyonkezels (holding), a csoportfinanszrozs, a befektetsi alapok s hasonl befektet intzmnyek tevkenysge (64-es gazat), a viszontbiztosts s a nyugdjalapok (65-s gazat).
Nem ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartoznak az olyan pnzgyi szolgltatsokat tmogat tevkenysgek, amelyek nmagukban nem tekinthetk pnzgyi tevkenysgnek (pldul.: banki tevkenysgeket tmogat informci-technolgiai szolgltatsok).

rdf:Description.skos:prefLabel: WATER SUPPLY; SEWERAGE, WASTE MANAGEMENT AND REMEDIATION ACTIVITIES
VZELLTS; SZENNYVZ GYJTSE, KEZELSE, HULLADKGAZDLKODS, SZENNYEZDSMENTESTS
rdf:Description.xkos:coreContentNote:
This section includes activities related to the management, collection, pretreatment, recovery and disposal, of various forms of waste (for example, solid or non-solid industrial or household waste) and its organisation.
The output of the waste or sewage treatment process can either be disposed of or become an input into other production processes. Secondary raw materials are materials and products which can be used as raw materials by simple reuse, or via recycling and recovery of waste. Activities of water supply are also grouped in this section, since they are often carried out in connection with, or by units also engaged in, the treatment of sewage.
The activities also include remediation of contaminated buildings and sites, soil, surface and groundwater (for example, oceans, mangroves, seas), and so on.
Units that usually take over their clients' waste procedures and become the customer of the waste hauler, and then in turn charge their clients for waste services, are classified in division 38. Even if these units do not render the corresponding services themselves, they are responsible for their fulfilment. This activity is regarded as the complete outsourcing of a service.
This section excludes: - waste trade activities as agents, see 46.18 - waste trade activities as wholesalers, see 46.87

Ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartoznak a klnbz tpus, pl. szilrd vagy nem szilrd, ipari vagy hztartsi hulladk kezelsvel, pl. gyjtsvel, elkezelsvel, hasznostsval s rtalmatlantsval kapcsolatos tevkenysgek s szervezeteik.
A hulladk- vagy szennyvzkezelsi folyamat sorn keletkezett vgtermkek rtalmatlanthatk vagy ms termelsi folyamat alapanyagaiv vlhatnak. A msodlagos nyersanyagok olyan anyagok s termkek, amelyek egyszer jrahasznlattal, vagy a hulladk hasznostsval s feldolgozsval nyersanyagknt hasznlhatk fel. A vzelltssal kapcsolatos tevkenysgek szintn ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartoznak, mivel azokat gyakran ugyanaz a szolgltat vgzi, mint a szennyvzkezelst (szennyvzgyjts, -tisztts).
A tevkenysgek magukban foglaljk a szennyezett pletek s terletek, a talaj, a felszni s a felszn alatti vizek (pldul cenok, mangrovk, tengerek) stb. helyrelltst.
Azok a gazdasgi egysgek, amelyek hulladkkezels-szolgltatsi dj fejben tveszik az gyfeleik hulladkkezelssel sszefgg tevkenysgeit s az gyfeleik helyett k lpnek szerzdses kapcsolatba a hulladkszlltval, a 38-as gazatba tartoznak. Mg ha ezek az egysgek nem is maguk nyjtjk a megfelel szolgltatsokat, felelsek azok teljestsrt. Ez a tevkenysg a szolgltats teljes kiszervezsnek minsl.
Nem ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik: - hulladk gynki nagykereskedelme, lsd: 46.18 - hulladk-nagykereskedelem, lsd: 46.87
rdf:Description.skos:altLabel: WATER SUPPLY; SEWERAGE, WASTE MANAGEMENT AND REMEDIATION ACTIVITIES
VZELLTS; SZENNYVZ GYJTSE, KEZELSE, HULLADKGAZDLKODS, SZENNYEZDSMENTESTS

rdf:Description.xkos:coreContentNote:
Ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik a szemly- vagy ruszllts, vaston, csvezetken, kzton, vzen vagy levegben, belertve az utasok szlltst, fggetlenl attl, hogy magn, szakmai vagy szabadids cllal, menetrend szerint vagy anlkl trtnik. A sofrrel vagy kezelvel rendelkez szllteszkz brbeadsa, valamint a postai s futrpostai tevkenysg is ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik.
Ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartoznak a kapcsold tevkenysgek is, pldul a terminl- s parkolltestmny zemeltetse, az rufuvarozs, a raktrozs s a trols, pldul a sil, ruraktr, troltartly zemeltetse. A 49-es, 50-es, 51-es s 53-as gazatba sorolt szlltsi tevkenysgek gyakran magukban foglalnak olyan kapcsold tevkenysgeket is, mint pldul a csomagolsi, rukezelsi mveletek, az ideiglenes ldzs, a mintavtel s az ruk mrlegelse, amelyek kizrlag a szlltsi tevkenysget tmogatjk. Ezeket a tmogat tevkenysgeket csak akkor kell az 52-es gazatba sorolni, ha azokat msok nevben vgzik.
Ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gazatba tartozik mg: - kzvetti szolgltatsok, amelyek sszektik az gyfeleket a szlltsi szolgltatkkal, kivve a 79-es gazat kzvetti tevkenysgeit
Nem ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gazatba tartozik: - kzlekedsi eszkz nagyobb javtsa, karbantartsa vagy talaktsa, a gpjrm kivtelvel, lsd: 33.1 algazat - t, vast, kikt, repltr ptse, karbantartsa s javtsa, lsd: 42 gazat - szllteszkz brbeadsa vezet- vagy kezelszemlyzet nlkl, lsd: 77.1, 77.3 algazat - szabadids ltestmny szerves rszeknt vgzett szlltsi tevkenysg, pl. vidmparkban, lsd: 93.2 algazat - gpjrm-karbantarts, -javts, lsd: 95.31 - motorkerkpr karbantartsa, javtsa, lsd: 95.32

This section includes the transport of passengers or freight, by rail, pipeline, road, water or air. It includes the transport of passengers regardless of the reasons, whether for personal, professional or recreational reasons, scheduled or not. Rental of transport equipment with a driver or operator as well as postal and courier activities are classified in this section.
The section also includes associated activities (for example, operation of terminal and parking facilities, cargo handling, warehousing and storage, such as the operation of silos, merchandise warehouses, storage tanks). Transport activities classified in divisions 49, 50, 51 and 53 often involve related activities (for example, packaging, goods handling operations, temporary crating, sampling and weighing of goods) which solely support the transport activities. These supporting activities are only to be classified in division 52 if they are performed on behalf of others.
This section also includes: - intermediation services that link customers to transport service providers, except for division 79
This section excludes: - major repair, maintenance or alteration of transport equipment, except motor vehicles, see 33.1 - construction, maintenance and repair of roads, railways, harbours, airfields, see division 42 - rental of transport equipment without a driver or operator, see 77.1, 77.3 - transport activities as an integral part of recreational facilities (e.g. in theme parks), see 93.2 - maintenance and repair of motor vehicles, see 95.31 - maintenance and repair of motorcycles, see 95.32

rdf:Description.skos:prefLabel: HUMAN HEALTH AND SOCIAL WORK ACTIVITIES
rdf:Description.xkos:coreContentNote: This section includes the provision of a wide range of health and social work activities. These activities can be exercised by private or public service providers.
Ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik az egszsggyi s a szocilis ellts. A tevkenysgek szles krt leli fel, magn- s llami tevkenysgeket egyarnt.
rdf:Description.skos:altLabel: HUMAN HEALTH AND SOCIAL WORK ACTIVITIES

rdf:Description.skos:prefLabel: NACE Rev. 2.1 - Statistical Classification of Economic Activities in the European Community, 2025
TEOR'25 - Gazdasgi tevkenysgek egysges gazati osztlyozsi rendszere, 2025 teljes

rdf:Description.xkos:coreContentNote:
Ez a nemzetgazdasgi g magban foglalja a nvnyi s az llati termszeti erforrsok felhasznlst, belertve a nvnytermesztsi, az llattenysztsi, a fakitermelsi s az egyb nvnybetakartsi tevkenysget, valamint a gazdasgban nevelt vagy a termszetes krnyezetben l llatokbl kszl llati termkek ellltsnak tevkenysgt.
Ez a nemzetgazdasgi g magban foglalja mg a biogazdlkodst, az akvakultrt, a genetikailag mdostott nvnyek termesztst, valamint a genetikailag mdostott llatok tenysztst is.
Ez a nemzetgazdasgi g nem tartalmazza a hztartsok ltal vgzett, az nelltsukhoz szksges, nem elklnthet termk-ellltsi tevkenysgeket, amelyek a 98.10 szakgazatba tartoznak.

This section includes the exploitation of vegetal and animal natural resources, comprising the activities of growing of crops, raising and breeding of animals, harvesting of timber and other plants, and the production of animal products from a farm or natural habitats.
This section also includes organic agriculture, aquaculture, the growing of genetically modified crops and the raising of genetically modified animals.
This section excludes undifferentiated subsistence goods-producing activities of households, which are classified in class 98.10.

Mining and quarrying include the extraction of minerals occurring naturally as solids (coal and ores), liquids (petroleum) or gases (natural gas). Extraction can be achieved by different methods (for example, underground or surface mining, well operation, seabed mining).
This section includes supplementary activities aimed at preparing the crude materials for marketing (for example, crushing, grinding, cleaning, drying, sorting, concentrating ores and liquefaction of natural gas).
Mining activities are classified into divisions, groups and classes on the basis of the principal mineral produced. Divisions 05 and 06 are concerned with mining and quarrying of fossil fuels (coal, lignite, petroleum, gas); divisions 07 and 08 concern metal ores, various minerals and quarry products.
Some of the technical operations of this section, particularly related to the extraction of hydrocarbons, may also be carried out for third parties by specialised units as an industrial service activity which is reflected in division 09.
This section excludes: - further processing of the extracted materials, see section C - use of the extracted materials without further transformation for construction purposes, see section F - bottling of natural spring and mineral waters at springs and wells, see 11.07 - remediation of mine sites, see 39.00

A bnyszat s kfejts nemzetgazdasgi g tartalmazza a termszetben elfordul svnyok, kztk a szilrd svnyok (szn s rcek), a folykony svnyok (kolaj) s a gzok (fldgz) kitermelst. A kitermelst klnbz mdszerekkel, pldul mlymvelssel, klszni fejtssel, kolaj- s fldgzkutak zemeltetsvel, a tengerfenken vgzett bnyszattal vgzik.
Ez a nemzetgazdasgi g tartalmazza a nyersanyagok rtkestsre val elksztst clz kiegszt tevkenysgeket, pldul a trst, az rlst, a tiszttst, a szrtst, a vlogatst, az rcdstst s a fldgz cseppfolystst.
A bnyszati tevkenysg a kitermelt fontosabb svnyok szerint gazatokba, algazatokba s szakgazatokba sorolhat. A 05 s a 06 gazat tartalmazza a fosszilis tzelanyagok (szn, lignit, kolaj, fldgz) bnyszatt. A 07 s a 08 gazat tartalmazza a fmrcek, a klnbz svnyok s a kfejts termkeinek bnyszatt.
Az ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartoz nhny technikai tevkenysget (klnsen a sznhidrogn-kitermelshez kapcsoldan) erre szakosodott gazdasgi szervezetek vgezhetnek harmadik fl rszre ipari szolgltatsknt. Az ilyen szolgltats a 09-es gazatba tartozik.
Nem ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik: - kitermelt nyersanyag tovbbi feldolgozsa, lsd: C nemzetgazdasgi g - kitermelt nyersanyag tovbbi talakts nlkli felhasznlsa ptipari clokra, lsd: F nemzetgazdasgi g - termszetes forrs- s svnyvz palackozsa forrsnl vagy ktnl, lsd: 11.07 - bnyaterlet krmentestse, lsd: 39.00

Ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartoznak az ingatlanok tulajdonlsval, brbeadsval, vsrlsval, eladsval, fejlesztsvel vagy feljtsval (jrafejlesztsvel) kapcsolatos tevkenysgek. Idetartoznak a klnbz ingatlanbefektetk, pldul ingatlanbefektetsi trsasgok, ingatlanbefektetsi alapok (REIT), ingatlanvagyon-kezel cgek, ingatlanalapok, ingatlanfejleszt trsasgok vagy ingatlanforgalmazk, laksszvetkezetek. Idetartoznak tovbb az gynkk s/vagy brkerek, akik a kvetkezk kzl egy vagy tbb terleten tevkenykednek: rtkests vagy ingatlanok adsvtele, ingatlanok brbeadsa, egyb ingatlanszolgltatsok nyjtsa, pldul ingatlanok felbecslse vagy ingatlanletti gynkknt val mkds. Az ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartoz tevkenysgek vgezhetk sajt s brelt ingatlanra vonatkozan djazsrt vagy szerzdses alapon.
Ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik mg a sajt tulajdon pletek vagy ptmnyek ptsi projektjeinek fejlesztse, s ptmrnki feladatainak elltsa ksbbi rtkests vagy brbeads cljbl.
Nem ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik: - ltalnos s specilis ptipari tevkenysgek pletek s ptmnyek esetben, lsd: F nemzetgazdasgi g

This section includes the activities of owning, renting out, buying, selling, developing or refurbishing (redeveloping) property. It includes various types of real estate investors (for example, real estate investment companies, real estate investment trust (REITs), real estate asset management firms, real estate funds, real estate development companies or real estate traders, housing cooperatives).
Furthermore, it includes agents and/or brokers in one or more of the following: selling or buying real estate, renting out of real estate, providing other real estate services (for example, appraising real estate or acting as a real estate escrow agent). Activities in this section may be carried out on self-owned or leased property and may be carried out on a fee or contract basis.
This section also includes the development of construction projects for self-owned buildings or civil engineering works for later sale or rental.
This section excludes: - general construction and specialised construction activities for buildings and civil engineering works, see section F

Ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik minden szint s brmely szakmra felkszt oktats. Az oktats lehet szbeli vagy rsbeli, s trtnhet rdin, televzin, interneten keresztl vagy levelezs tjn. Az oktatsi tevkenysgek olyan tevkenysgek, amelyek oktatsi programmal, idkerettel s az elrt tudst mr rtkelsi rendszerrel rendelkeznek.
Ez a nemzetgazdasgi g tartalmazza a formlis iskolarendszer oktats klnbz szintjeit, amelyeket az llamilag szablyozott iskolarendszer klnbz oktatsi intzmnyei nyjtanak a tanulk szmra, olyan tanulsi folyamatknt, amely megelzi a munkaerpiacra trtn els belpst, valamint az iskolarendszeren kvli formlis oktatst, amennyiben ezen oktatsi programok tartalma s az ltaluk megszerezhet kpests egyenrtk az iskolarendszer oktatsval (felnttkpzs, rs-olvasst oktat programok stb.). Idetartoznak pldul a katonai iskolk s az akadmik, a bntets-vgrehajtsi intzetek ltal nyjtott oktatsi tevkenysgek a megfelel szinteken. Ez a nemzetgazdasgi g magban foglalja a ktelez s a nem ktelez iskolai oktatst, valamint az llami s nem llami oktatst. Az egyes oktatsi szintek esetben a szakgazatok magukban foglaljk a sajtos nevelsi igny tanulk specilis oktatst is. A 85.1-tl 85.4-ig algazatok az ISCED-P 2011 osztlyozs, azaz az oktatsi programok egysges nemzetkzi osztlyozsi rendszere szerinti formlis oktatsi tevkenysgeket veszi figyelembe. Kvetkezskppen a jelen nemzetgazdasgi gban szerepl kategrik bontsa az ISCED-P 2011* szintjei ltal meghatrozott oktatsi szintek alapjn trtnik. Az ISCED-P 2011 0. szintjn kpzst nyjt oktatsi intzmnyek tevkenysgei a 85.10, az ISCED-P 2011 1. szintjn a 85.20., az ISCED-P 2011 2. szint 24-es kategrijn s 3. szint 34-es kategrijn a 85.31, az ISCED-P 2011 2. szint 25-s kategrijn s 3. szint 35-s kategrijn a 85.32, az ISCED-P 2011 4. szintjn a 85.33, az ISCED-P 2011 5., 6., 7., 8. szintjn pedig a 85.4-es algazatba tartoznak.
A 85.2-85.4-es algazatba sorolt oktatsi intzmnyek jogosultak az oktatsi program sikeres elvgzst tanstani, ltalban az illetkes nemzeti oktatsi hatsgok ltal hivatalosan elismert okirat formjban.
MEGJEGYZS: * Az oktatsi szintek s a kpestsek nemzeti nyelv megnevezse kztti megfeleltetsek itt tallhatk: https://europa.eu/!mDwYbG
Ez a nemzetgazdasgi g tovbb a formlis s nem formlis oktatsi programok megklnbztetsn alapul, amelyet a tanulsi tevkenysgek eurpai osztlyozsa (Classification of Learning Activities, CLA) hatroz meg. gy ez a nemzetgazdasgi g felleli az elssorban sporttal, mvszetekkel s szabadids kpzssel, valamint az oktatst tmogat tevkenysgekkel kapcsolatos nem formlis oktatst is (a 85.5-85.6-os algazatokban). Ez a nemzetgazdasgi g magban foglalja a vllalkoz/szmlakpes/raad/fggetlen tanrok vagy oktatk ltal vgzett oktatsi tevkenysgeket is. Az ilyen tevkenysgeket a 85.5-os algazatba kell besorolni. Idetartoznak tovbb az iskolk s az egyb oktatsi intzmnyek igazgatsval, ellenrzsvel, mkdtetsvel s tmogatsval kapcsolatos tevkenysgek, valamint a sportprogramok koordinlsa.
Nem ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik: - gyermekek napkzbeni elltsa, lsd: 88.91

This section includes education at any level or for any profession. The instructions may be oral or written and may be provided by radio, television, the internet or via correspondence.
Education activities are those having an educational programme, a time frame and some evaluation of the knowledge achieved.
This section includes formal initial education at its various levels provided by institutions in the regular school system designed for students as a continuous educational pathway before their first entrance into the labour market, as well as formal education outside the regular school system with programme content and qualifications that are equivalent to those of such initial education (adult education, literacy programmes, and so on).
Also included are activities provided at their respective levels by military schools and academies, prison schools, and so on.
This section includes compulsory and non-compulsory schooling, as well as public and private education.
For each level of education, special education for physically or mentally disabled persons is included.
Groups 85.1 to 85.4 take into account the formal education activities provided under the international classification of educational programmes (ISCED-P 2011 classification). The breakdown of the categories in this section is based on the level of education offered as defined by the levels of ISCED-P 2011*. The activities of educational institutions providing courses at ISCED-P 2011 Level 0 are classified in class 85.10, at ISCED-P 2011 Level 1 in class 85.20, at ISCED-P 2011 Level 2 category 24 and Level 3 category 34 in class 85.31, at ISCED-P 2011 2011 Level 2 category 25 and Level 3 category 35 in class 85.32, at ISCED-P 2011 Level 4 in class 85.33 and at ISCED-P 2011 Levels 5 to 8 in group 85.4.
Educational institutions classified in groups 85.2 to 85.4 are authorised to certify successful completion of an educational programme, usually in the form of a document officially recognised by the relevant national education authorities.
NOTE: * mappings between the levels of education and the name of the qualifications in national language can be found here https://europa.eu/!mDwYbG
This section is also based on the distinction between formal and non-formal educational programmes provided by the European classification of learning activities (CLA). Thus, it also includes non-formal instruction primarily concerned with sports, arts and recreation education, and education support activities in groups 85.5 and 85.6.
This section also includes education activities run by self-employed / own account / individual / independent lecturers (tutors, academics, instructors); such activities should be classified in group 85.5.
This section also includes activities relating to administration, inspection, operation or support of schools and other institutions providing education as well as coordination of sports programmes.
This section excludes: - child day-care activities, see 88.91

rdf:Description.skos:prefLabel: ACTIVITIES OF EXTRATERRITORIAL ORGANISATIONS AND BODIES
rdf:Description.skos:altLabel: ACTIVITIES OF EXTRATERRITORIAL ORGANISATIONS AND BODIES

rdf:Description.xkos:coreContentNote: Ez a nemzetgazdasgi g (maradk kategriaknt) tartalmazza az rdekkpviseletek tevkenysgt, szmtgpek, szemlyes s hztartsi cikkek, illetve gpjrmvek s motorkerkprok javtst, tovbb szmos mshova nem sorolt szemlyi szolgltatst.

This section (as a residual category) includes the activities of membership organisations, the repair of computers, personal and household goods, motor vehicles and motorcycles, and a variety of personal service activities not covered elsewhere in the classification.

rdf:Description.skos:prefLabel: HZTARTS MUNKAADI TEVKENYSGE; TERMK ELLLTSA, SZOLGLTATS VGZSE SAJT FOGYASZTSRA
ACTIVITIES OF HOUSEHOLDS AS EMPLOYERS AND UNDIFFERENTIATED GOODS- AND SERVICE-PRODUCING ACTIVITIES OF HOUSEHOLDS FOR OWN USE

rdf:Description.skos:altLabel: HZTARTS MUNKAADI TEVKENYSGE; TERMK ELLLTSA, SZOLGLTATS VGZSE SAJT FOGYASZTSRA
ACTIVITIES OF HOUSEHOLDS AS EMPLOYERS AND UNDIFFERENTIATED GOODS- AND SERVICE-PRODUCING ACTIVITIES OF HOUSEHOLDS FOR OWN USE

rdf:Description.skos:prefLabel: ELECTRICITY, GAS, STEAM AND AIR CONDITIONING SUPPLY
rdf:Description.xkos:coreContentNote:
This section includes the generation, storage, control, distribution, trade and brokerage of electric power or of gaseous fuels for energy supply through a permanent network of lines, mains and pipes. Energy supply for industrial parks or residential buildings is included.
This section therefore includes the operation of electricity and gas utilities.
The section also includes heating and cooling (for example, steam and air conditioning supply) through a permanent network.
This section excludes: - extraction of crude natural gas, see 06.20 - water supply and sewerage, see divisions 36, 37 - transport of gas through pipelines, i.e. not through the distribution network, see 49.50

Ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik a villamos energia s a gz-halmazllapot tzelanyagok ellltsa, trolsa, ellenrzse, elosztsa, kereskedelme s kzvettse vezetkek, fvezetkek s mellkvezetkek infrastruktrjn (lland hlzatn) keresztl. Idetartozik az ipari parkok s a lakpletek energiaelltsa is.
Ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik a villamosenergia- s gzkzmvek zemeltetse.
Ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik tovbb az lland hlzaton keresztl trtn fts s a hts, pl. a gzellts s a lgkondicionls.
Nem ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik: - nyers fldgz kitermelse, lsd: 06.20 - vzellts s szennyvzkezels, lsd a 36, 37 gazat - gz szlltsa csvezetken, azaz nem eloszthlzaton keresztl, lsd: 49.50
rdf:Description.skos:altLabel: ELECTRICITY, GAS, STEAM AND AIR CONDITIONING SUPPLY

rdf:Description.skos:prefLabel: PUBLISHING, BROADCASTING, AND CONTENT PRODUCTION AND DISTRIBUTION ACTIVITIES
rdf:Description.xkos:coreContentNote:
Ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik az informcis termkek ellltsa s kiadsa, sugrzsa s egyb terjesztse.
Ez a nemzetgazdasgi g magban foglalja a knyv-, jsg-, folyirat- s szoftverkiadsi tevkenysget (58-as gazat), a mozgkp-, vide- s televzis msorelemek gyrtst, a hangfelvtelt s zenemkiadst (59-es gazat), a rdi- s televzimsor-szolgltatst, valamint a televzis vagy rdis msorok gyrtst s terjesztst, belertve az online kzvettst (streaming), a letltsi s tartalomterjesztsi (megosztsi) platformok zemeltetst, a blog- s wikioldalak, kzssgi oldalak, valamint az online jtk/videjtk-oldalak zemeltetst (60-as gazat).
A kiadsi tevkenysgbe tartozik a tartalom (informcis termkek) szerzi jogainak (copyright) megszerzse s ezen tartalomnak a nagykznsg szmra val hozzfrhetv ttele, a tartalom klnbz formban trtn sokszorostsa s terjesztse (vagy ezen tevkenysgek megszervezse) ltal. A kiadk egy rsze kizrlag kiadi tevkenysget vgez s a tartalom terjesztsre vonatkoz szerzi jogot (licencet) ad el, msik rsze kiadja s terjeszti az ltaluk ltrehozott vagy birtokolt tartalmat. A kiads minden lehetsges formja (nyomtatott, elektronikus, digitlis, analg vagy brmilyen ms formban) s a szerzi kiadsi tevkenysg ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik.
Az egyes televzis msorszmok, pldul filmek, televzis sorozatok gyrtsa az 59-es gazatba tartozik, mg a teljes televzis csatorna program sszelltst az 59-es gazatban ellltott msorszmokbl vagy ms elemekbl (pl. l hrmsorokbl) a 60-as gazat tartalmazza. Ugyancsak idetartozik ezen msorok gyrt ltali sugrzsa is.
Ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik mg: - kiadott tartalom szerzi jogainak keletkeztetse s hasznlatba adsa
Nem ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik: - rgztett adathordoz nagy- s kiskereskedelme, lsd: G nemzetgazdasgi g - tvkzlsi s kapcsold szolgltatsi tevkenysg, azaz a beszd-, adat-, szveg-, hang- s kptvitel, szmtgpes programozsi tevkenysg, szmtstechnikai infrastruktra- s trhelyszolgltats, valamint webes keresportl, lsd: K nemzetgazdasgi g - pnzgyi s biztostsi szolgltats nyjtsa kiadott pnzgyi s biztostsi technolgiai szoftverek felhasznlsval, lsd: L nemzetgazdasgi g - szerzi jog kezelse, lsd: 74.91 - lemezklcsnzs, lsd: 77.22 - fggetlen zensz s sznsz (belertve a vlogokban megjelen influenszereket is), r s blogger tevkenysge, akiknek a tartalmt harmadik fl teszi kzz, valamint online szerencsejtk-oldalak mkdtetse, lsd: S nemzetgazdasgi g

This section includes the production and publishing, broadcasting and other distribution of information products.
This section includes: book, newspaper, periodical and software publishing activities (division 58); the production of motion picture, video and television programme elements , sound recording and music publishing activities (division 59); radio and television broadcasting as well as television or radio programme production and distribution activities, including the operation of streaming, downloads and content distribution (sharing) platforms not associated with publishing of the content, the operation of blogs and wiki sites, social network sites and online gaming / video game sites (division 60).
Publishing refers to the acquisition of copyrights to content (information products) and making this content available to the general public by engaging in (or arranging for) the reproduction and distribution of this content in various forms. Publishers may solely publish and then license rights to others to distribute their content, or they may publish and distribute content they create or own. All the feasible forms of publishing (in print, electronic, digital, analogue, or any other form) and self-publishing activities are included in this section.
Individual television programming components (for example, movies, television series) are produced by activities in division 59, while the creation of a complete programme for a television channel, from components produced in division 59 or other components (for example, live news programming), is included in division 60. Division 60 also includes the broadcasting of this programme by the producer.
This section also includes: - the creation and leasing of copyrights for published content
This section excludes: - wholesale and retail sale of recorded media, see section G - activities of providing telecommunication and related service activities, i.e. transmitting voice, data, text, sound and video, computer programming activities, computing infrastructure and hosting activities, and web search portals, see section K - provision of financial and insurance services using published financial and insurance technologies software, see section L - the management of copyrights, see 74.91 - rental of discs, see 77.22 - activities of independent musicians and actors (including influencers appearing in vlogs), writers and bloggers, whose content is published by a third party, and gambling sites, see section S
rdf:Description.skos:altLabel: PUBLISHING, BROADCASTING, AND CONTENT PRODUCTION AND DISTRIBUTION ACTIVITIES

rdf:Description.xkos:coreContentNote:
Ez a nemzetgazdasgi g tartalmazza brmilyen tpus fizikai ru nagy- s kiskereskedelmt (azaz talakts nlkli rtkestst), valamint az ruk rtkestshez kapcsold szolgltatsok nyjtst. Az ruk olyan fizikai, ellltott trgyak, amelyekre kereslet van, amelyek felett tulajdonjogot lehet szerezni, s amelyek tulajdonjoga a piacokon trtn gyletek rvn egyik egysgrl a msikra truhzhat. Ez sszhangban ll a fizetsi mrleg terletn, a G20-ak digitlis gazdasggal foglalkoz munkacsoportjban s a digitlis kereskedelem mrsrl szl kziknyvben stb. alkalmazott meghatrozsokkal s fogalmakkal.
A nagy- s kiskereskedelem az utols lps az ruk elosztsban. Ebbl a clbl kiegszt tevkenysgeket (lsd Mdszertani tmutat, xx. fejezet) vgeznek, amelyek a kereskedelemhez kapcsold szmos szoksos mveletet (rukezelst) foglalnak magukban, az ruk talaktsa nlkl. Ezek a mveletek (rukezelsek) magukban foglaljk pldul az ruk vlogatst, osztlyozst s sszeszerelst, az ruk (pl. homok) keverst vagy elegytst, a palackozst (elzetes palacktiszttssal vagy anlkl), a csomagolst, az mlesztett, nagy kiszerels ruk sztosztst s jracsomagolst kisebb ttelekben trtn forgalmazs cljbl, a raktrozst (belertve a fagyasztva vagy htve trolst is). Ha az emltett tevkenysgek nem a kereskedelemmel kapcsolatos szoksos mveletek (rukezelsek), akkor a TEOR ms nemzetgazdasgi gaiban f-, msodlagos vagy kiegszt tevkenysgknt vgezhetk.
A nagykereskedelem (46-os gazat) s a kiskereskedelem (47-es gazat) kztti klnbsgttel a vev tpusa alapjn trtnik.
A nagykereskedelembe tartozik az j s hasznlt ruk viszonteladsa kiskereskedknek, ms nagykereskedknek, illetve ms vllalkozsoknak (pl. ipari, kereskedelmi, kzleti felhasznlknak) zleti clokra. Szintn idetartozik az ilyen szemlyek vagy vllalkozsok rszre trtn ruvsrls vagy ruelads sorn gynkknt vagy brkerknt val kzremkds. Az ilyen gyletekkel foglalkoz vllalkozsok kz tartoznak az ruk felett rendelkez nagykereskedk (akik tulajdonjogot szereznek az ltaluk rtkestett rukra), rutzsdei kereskedk, ipari elosztk, exportrk, importrk, beszerzsi trsulsok, illetve a gyrt- vagy bnyszati egysgek ltal termkeik marketingje rdekben fenntartott, a telephelykben azoktl eltr rtkestsi irodk (ahol nem folyik kiskereskedelmi tevkenysg), amelyek nem pusztn a gyrt- vagy bnyszati egysgtl kzvetlen kiszlltssal teljestend rendelsek felvtelt vgzik. Idetartoznak az rutzsdei brkerek, megbzsos (bizomnyos) kereskedk, gynkk s felvsrlk is. Ha a nagykeresked nem szerez tulajdonjogot az ltala forgalmazott ruk felett, akkor a tevkenysge a 46.1-es algazatba soroland. Ha a nagykeresked az ru felett tulajdonjogot szerez, a tevkenysgt a 46.2-46.9-es algazatokba kell besorolni, mg akkor is, ha a nagykeresked egy harmadik fl nevben jr el.
A nagykereskedk gyakran fizikailag sszerakjk, vlogatjk, osztlyozzk a nagyttel rukat, az mlesztett rukat megbontjk, elosztjk kisebb kiszerelsekbe s jracsomagoljk (pl. gygyszerek esetben); az rukat raktrozzk, htik, kiszlltjk, zembe helyezik, rszt vesznek az eladssztnzsben, cmketervezsben.
A kiskereskedelembe tartozik az j s hasznlt ruk viszonteladsa vgs fogyasztk szmra szemlyes vagy hztartsi fogyaszts vagy felhasznls cljbl, az rtkestsi csatorntl fggetlenl, zletekben, ruhzakban, standokon, csomagkld ruhzakban, hzal kereskedknl, hzal rusoknl, fogyaszti szvetkezetekben, aukcis hzakban stb. Idetartozik az ruk bemutattermekben (amelyekben a killtott rukat meg lehet vsrolni), tmeneti rtkestsi pontokon keresztl (pl. pop-up zletek - rvid lettartalm boltok), valamint automatizlt kiskereskedelmi zletekben trtn rtkestse.
A legtbb kiskeresked tulajdonjogot szerez az ltala rtkestett ru felett, de egyesek gynkknt jrnak el, s bizomnyi vagy jutalkos alapon rtkestenek. Ha a kiskeresked nem szerez tulajdonjogot az ltala forgalmazott ru felett, akkor a 47.9-es algazatba soroland. Ha a kiskeresked az ru felett tulajdonjogot szerez, a 47.1-47.8-as algazatokba soroland, mg akkor is, ha egy harmadik fl nevben jr el.
A TEOR nem tesz klnbsget algazat s szakgazat szintjn a bolti s az online kiskereskedelmi rtkests kztt. A kiskereskedelmi rtkestsi tevkenysgek tbbsge mind az zletben, mind az interneten (valamint ms rtkestsi csatornkon) mkdik, s az elsdleges rtkestsi mdszerek alapjn nehz klnbsget tenni a kt forgalmazsi/rtkestsi csatorna kztt. Az zleten belli s az online rtkests arnya idvel vltozhat, ami befolysolja a besorols stabilitst. A TEOR f osztlyozsi elve szerint a kiskereskedelmi tevkenysgek osztlyozsa a forgalmazott ru alapjn trtnik, nem pedig az rtkests mdja szerint.
A csomagkld vagy internetes kiskereskedelmet az eladott ruk tpusa szerint osztlyozzk.
A nagy- s kiskereskedelmi rtkests kztti klnbsgttel nem az eladott ruk mennyisge alapjn trtnik, mivel a nagykereskedelem trtnhet darabszm alapjn, ahogy a kiskereskedelmi rtkests is trtnhet mlesztett formban. Ehelyett a nagykereskedelmi s a kiskereskedelmi rtkests kztti elsdleges klnbsgttel a vsrl tpusa. A nagykereskedk ltalban zleti gyfeleknek rtkestenek, a kiskereskedk pedig ltalban a vgs fogyasztknak, pldul hztartsoknak adnak el. Ha egy keresked zleti s vgs felhasznlknak egyarnt rtkest, s nem lehet meghatrozni, hogy a vevk tbbsge zleti vagy vgs fogyaszt, akkor az eladt javasolt kiskereskedknt kezelni.
A gyrt vagy a vllalkoz ltali ital elegyts a gyrts (C nemzetgazdasgi g) al tartozik. A kereskedelemhez kapcsold szoksos mveletknt vgzett keversi tevkenysg kiegszt tevkenysgnek minsl s a G nemzetgazdasgi gba soroland.
Ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik mg: - tranzitkereskedelmi tevkenysgek, amelyek ruk vsrlsbl s egyik vmterletrl a msikra trtn szlltsbl llnak. A tranzitkereskedelem olyan hromszggyletet jelent, amelyben a tranzitkeresked a sajt gazdasgi terletn kvl kt vagy tbb klnbz orszg kztt export- s importgyletet hajt vgre. A tranzitkeresked az ru tulajdonosa a szllts sorn (ellenttben a kzvettkkel, akik nem szereznek tulajdonjogot a kzvettett ru felett) - szakosodott s vegyes termkkr kiskereskedelem kzvettse, ami a 47.9 algazat al soroland - lelmiszerek s italok rtkestse automatn vagy automatizlt rtkestsi ponton keresztl
Ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik - magyar kiegszts: - minden olyan jelleg sszeszerels, sszellts, amelyet a keresked vgez, s amely nem eredmnyez j termket, pl. lapra szerelt btor sszelltsa, kerkpr bezemelse, illetve felszerelse az gyfl ltal ignyelt plusz kellkekkel (pl. csomagtart, srvd)
Nem ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik: - villamosenergia-kereskedelem, lsd: 35.15 - gznem tzelanyagok kereskedelme vezetkes energiaellts cljbl, lsd: 35.23 - digitlis ruk kereskedelme, digitlis platformokon trtn tartalomstreamels s -letlts, pl. e-knyvek, hanganyagok, lsd: J nemzetgazdasgi g - feltlts telefonkrtyk s kapcsold szolgltatsok viszonteladi tevkenysge, lsd: 61.20 - gpjrmjavts, lsd: 95 gazat - a szvetkezeti trsuls, mely a ftevkenysge alapjn soroland be
Nem ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik - magyar kiegszts: - az olyan jelleg sszeszerels, amely sorn j termk keletkezik, lsd: C nemzetgazdasgi g

This section includes wholesale and retail sale (in other words, sale without transformation) of any type of physical goods and rendering services incidental to the sale of merchandise. Goods are physical, produced objects for which a demand exists, over which ownership rights can be established and whose ownership can be transferred from one unit to another by engaging in transactions on markets. This is consistent with the definitions and concepts applied in the balance of payments domain, the G20 Digital Economy Task Force, the Handbook on Measuring Digital Trade, and so on.
Wholesale and retail sale are the final steps in the distribution of merchandise. For this purpose, ancillary activities (see introductory guidelines, Chapter xx) are carried out, which include a number of usual operations (or manipulations) associated with trade, without transforming the goods. These operations (or manipulations) include, for example, sorting, grading and assembling of goods, mixing or blending of goods (for example, sand), bottling (with or without preceding bottle cleaning), packaging, breaking bulk and repacking for distribution in smaller lots, storage (whether or not frozen or chilled). If not carried out as usual operations (or manipulations) associated with trade, the mentioned activities can be carried out as principal, secondary or ancillary activities in other sections of NACE.
The distinction between wholesale (division 46) and retail sale (division 47) is based on the type of customer.
Wholesale is the resale of new and used goods to retailers, business-to-business trade (for example, to industrial, commercial, institutional or professional users) or other wholesalers, or it involves acting as an agent or broker in buying merchandise for, or selling merchandise to, such persons or companies. The principal types of businesses included are merchant wholesalers, in other words, wholesalers who take title to the goods they sell, such as wholesale merchants or jobbers, industrial distributors, exporters, importers, and cooperative buying associations, sales branches and sales offices (but not retail stores) that are maintained by manufacturing or mining units apart from their plants or mines for the purpose of marketing their products and that do not merely take orders to be filled by direct shipments from the plants or mines. Also included are merchandise and commodity brokers, commission merchants, agents, assemblers and buyers. If the wholesaler does not assume ownership of the goods the wholesaler trades, the wholesaler is classified in group 46.1. If the wholesaler assumes ownership of the goods, even if the wholesaler is acting on behalf of a third party, the wholesaler is classified in groups 46.2 to 46.9.
Wholesalers frequently physically assemble, sort and grade goods in large lots, break bulk, repack and redistribute in smaller lots (for example, for pharmaceuticals); store, refrigerate, deliver and install goods, engage in sales promotion for their customers and label design.
Retailing is the resale of new and used goods to final consumers for personal or household consumption or use, whatever the channel, in shops, department stores, stalls, mail order houses, door-to-door salespersons, hawkers, consumer cooperatives, auction houses, and so on. It includes the sale of goods via showrooms (where the exposed goods can be bought), via ephemeral points of sale (for example, pop-up stores) as well as in automated retail shops.
Most retailers take title to the goods they sell, but some act as agents for a principal and sell either on consignment or on a commission basis. If the retailer does not assume ownership of the goods the retailer trades, the retailer is classified in group 47.9. If the retailer assumes ownership of the goods, even if the retailer is acting on behalf of a third party, the retailer is classified in groups 47.1 to 47.8.
NACE does not make any distinction at group and class level between in-store and online retail sale. Most of the retail sale activities operate both in-store and online (as well other distribution channels) and it is difficult to differentiate between the two distribution/sales channels based on the primary sales method. The share of in-store and online sales can vary over time affecting the stability of the classification. The main classification criteria for retail sale in NACE is based on what is sold and not the sales channel.
Retailing via mail order or the internet is classified according to the type of goods sold.
The distinction between wholesale and retail sale is not based on the quantity of goods sold, as wholesale may be made on a unit basis, just as retail sales may be made on a bulk basis. Instead, the primary distinction between wholesale and retail sale is the type of customer. Wholesale usually involves business customers while retail usually involves final customers, such as households. If a trader sells to both business and final customers without distinction and it is practically impossible to distinguish the majority type of customers, then it is recommended to treat the seller as a retailer.
Blending of beverages to be provided by the manufacturer or by a contractor is classified in manufacturing (section C). If carried out as a usual operation (or manipulation) associated with trade, it is considered as an ancillary activity and integrated in section G.
This section also includes: - transit trade activities consisting of buying commodities, moving them from one customs territory to another. Transit trade represents a triangular transaction in which the transit trader carries out export and import transactions between two or more different countries outside their own economic territory. The transit trader owns the commodity during its transport (different to intermediaries that do not take ownership of the intermediated goods) - specialised and non-specialised intermediation service activities for retail sale, see 47.9 - sale of food and beverages via vending machines or automated points of sale
This section excludes: - trade of electricity, see 35.15 - trade of gaseous fuels for energy supply through mains, see 35.23 - the commerce of digital goods, streaming and downloading of content on digital platforms (e.g. e-books, audio), see section J - activities of resellers of prepaid calling cards and services, see 61.20 - repair of motor vehicles and motorcycles, see division 95 - cooperative associations; these are classified to their predominant activity

rdf:Description.skos:prefLabel: TELECOMMUNICATION, COMPUTER PROGRAMMING, CONSULTING, COMPUTING INFRASTRUCTURE AND OTHER INFORMATION SERVICE ACTIVITIES
TVKZLS, SZMTGPES PROGRAMOZS, INFORMCITECHNOLGIAI SZAKTANCSADS, SZMTSTECHNIKAI INFRASTRUKTRA S EGYB INFORMCIS SZOLGLTATSOK
rdf:Description.xkos:coreContentNote:
This section includes telecommunication and related service activities, in other words, transmitting voice, data, text, sound and video (division 61), computer programming, consultancy and related activities (division 62), and the provision of computing infrastructure, data processing, hosting and other information service activities (division 63).
This section excludes: - publishing, broadcasting and content production, including software publishing, post-production services to convert audio and video content into streaming formats and independent third-party provision of on-demand audio and video streaming or download distribution services, see section J - provision of financial and insurance services using published financial and insurance technologies software, see section L - activities of gambling sites, see 92.00 - repair and maintenance of computers and communication equipment, see 95.10

Ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik a tvkzlsi s a kapcsold szolgltats, azaz a beszd-, adat-, szveg-, hang- s kptvitel (61-es gazat), a szmtgp-programozs, tancsads s kapcsold tevkenysgek (62-es gazat), valamint a szmtstechnikai infrastruktra, adatfeldolgozs, trhelyszolgltats s egyb informcis szolgltats (63-es gazat).
Nem ebbe a nemzetgazdasgi gba tartozik: - kiadi, msorszr s tartalomgyrt tevkenysg, belertve a szoftverkiadst, az audio- s videtartalmak streaming formtumra talaktsra irnyul utmunka-szolgltatst, valamint a fggetlen harmadik fl ltal nyjtott, igny szerinti audio- s videstreaming vagy letltsi terjesztsi szolgltatst, lsd: J nemzetgazdasgi g - pnzgyi s biztostsi szolgltats nyjtsa kzztett pnzgyi s biztostsi technolgiai szoftver felhasznlsval, lsd: L nemzetgazdasgi g - szerencsejtk-weboldal zemeltetse, lsd: 92.00 - szmtgp s kommunikcis eszkz javtsa s karbantartsa, lsd: 95.10

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has top concept
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates, by convention, a concept scheme to a concept which is topmost in the broader/narrower concept hierarchies for that scheme, providing an entry point to these hierarchies.

rdf:Description.dc:title: The RDF Concepts Vocabulary (RDF)
rdf:Description.dc:description: This is the RDF Schema for the RDF vocabulary terms in the RDF Namespace, defined in RDF 1.1 Concepts.

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of ontologies.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Ontology

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The datatype of RDF literals storing fragments of HTML content
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: HTML

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of RDF datatypes.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Datatype

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The subject is a subclass of a class.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: subClassOf

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of literal values, eg. textual strings and integers.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The defininition of the subject resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: isDefinedBy

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Further information about the subject resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: seeAlso

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A human-readable name for the subject.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: label

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of plain (i.e. untyped) literal values, as used in RIF and OWL 2
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: PlainLiteral

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of RDF properties.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Property

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A range of the subject property.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: range

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of classes.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Class

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A domain of the subject property.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: domain

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class resource, everything.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Resource

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of RDF statements.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Statement

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The subject of the subject RDF statement.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: subject

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The predicate of the subject RDF statement.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: predicate

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The object of the subject RDF statement.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: object

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of unordered containers.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Bag

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of RDF containers.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Container

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of ordered containers.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Seq

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of containers of alternatives.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Alt

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Idiomatic property used for structured values.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: value

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of RDF Lists.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: List

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The empty list, with no items in it. If the rest of a list is nil then the list has no more items in it.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: nil

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The first item in the subject RDF list.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: first

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The rest of the subject RDF list after the first item.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: rest

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The datatype of XML literal values.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: XMLLiteral

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This ontology partially describes the built-in classes and properties that together form the basis of the RDF/XML syntax of OWL 2. The content of this ontology is based on Tables 6.1 and 6.2 in Section 6.4 of the OWL 2 RDF-Based Semantics specification, available at http://www.w3.org/TR/owl2-rdf-based-semantics/. Please note that those tables do not include the different annotations (labels, comments and rdfs:isDefinedBy links) used in this file. Also note that the descriptions provided in this ontology do not provide a complete and correct formal description of either the syntax or the semantics of the introduced terms (please see the OWL 2 recommendations for the complete and normative specifications). Furthermore, the information provided by this ontology may be misleading if not used with care. This ontology SHOULD NOT be imported into OWL ontologies. Importing this file into an OWL 2 DL ontology will cause it to become an OWL 2 Full ontology and may have other, unexpected, consequences.
rdf:Description.dc:title: The OWL 2 Schema vocabulary (OWL 2)

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that identifies the version IRI of an ontology.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: versionIRI

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that is used for importing other ontologies into a given ontology.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: imports

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The annotation property that provides version information for an ontology or another OWL construct.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: versionInfo

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of collections of pairwise different individuals.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AllDifferent

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of collections of pairwise disjoint classes.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AllDisjointClasses

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of collections of pairwise disjoint properties.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AllDisjointProperties

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of annotated annotations for which the RDF serialization consists of an annotated subject, predicate and object.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Annotation

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of annotation properties.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AnnotationProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of asymmetric properties.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AsymmetricProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of object properties.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ObjectProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of annotated axioms for which the RDF serialization consists of an annotated subject, predicate and object.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Axiom

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of OWL classes.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Class

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of OWL data ranges, which are special kinds of datatypes. Note: The use of the IRI owl:DataRange has been deprecated as of OWL 2. The IRI rdfs:Datatype SHOULD be used instead.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: DataRange

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of data properties.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: DatatypeProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of deprecated classes.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: DeprecatedClass

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of deprecated properties.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: DeprecatedProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of functional properties.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: FunctionalProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of inverse-functional properties.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: InverseFunctionalProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of irreflexive properties.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: IrreflexiveProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of named individuals.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: NamedIndividual

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of OWL individuals.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Thing

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of negative property assertions.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: NegativePropertyAssertion

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This is the empty class.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Nothing

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of ontology properties.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: OntologyProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of reflexive properties.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ReflexiveProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of property restrictions.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Restriction

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of symmetric properties.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: SymmetricProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of transitive properties.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: TransitiveProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the class that a universal property restriction refers to.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: allValuesFrom

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the predicate of an annotated axiom or annotated annotation.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: annotatedProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the subject of an annotated axiom or annotated annotation.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: annotatedSource

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the object of an annotated axiom or annotated annotation.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: annotatedTarget

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the predicate of a negative property assertion.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: assertionProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The annotation property that indicates that a given ontology is backward compatible with another ontology.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: backwardCompatibleWith

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The data property that does not relate any individual to any data value.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: bottomDataProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The object property that does not relate any two individuals.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: bottomObjectProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the cardinality of an exact cardinality restriction.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: cardinality

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines that a given class is the complement of another class.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: complementOf

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines that a given data range is the complement of another data range with respect to the data domain.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: datatypeComplementOf

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The annotation property that indicates that a given entity has been deprecated.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: deprecated

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines that two given individuals are different.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: differentFrom

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines that a given class is equivalent to the disjoint union of a collection of other classes.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: disjointUnionOf

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines that two given classes are disjoint.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: disjointWith

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the collection of pairwise different individuals in a owl:AllDifferent axiom.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: distinctMembers

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines that two given classes are equivalent, and that is used to specify datatype definitions.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: equivalentClass

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines that two given properties are equivalent.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: equivalentProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the collection of properties that jointly build a key.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasKey

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the property that a self restriction refers to.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasSelf

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the individual that a has-value restriction refers to.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hasValue

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The annotation property that indicates that a given ontology is incompatible with another ontology.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: incompatibleWith

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the collection of classes or data ranges that build an intersection.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: intersectionOf

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines that two given properties are inverse.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: inverseOf

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the cardinality of a maximum cardinality restriction.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: maxCardinality

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the cardinality of a maximum qualified cardinality restriction.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: maxQualifiedCardinality

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the collection of members in either a owl:AllDifferent, owl:AllDisjointClasses or owl:AllDisjointProperties axiom.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: members

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the cardinality of a minimum cardinality restriction.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: minCardinality

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the cardinality of a minimum qualified cardinality restriction.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: minQualifiedCardinality

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the class that a qualified object cardinality restriction refers to.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: onClass

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the data range that a qualified data cardinality restriction refers to.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: onDataRange

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the datatype that a datatype restriction refers to.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: onDatatype

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the collection of individuals or data values that build an enumeration.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: oneOf

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the n-tuple of properties that a property restriction on an n-ary data range refers to.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: onProperties

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the property that a property restriction refers to.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: onProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The annotation property that indicates the predecessor ontology of a given ontology.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: priorVersion

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the n-tuple of properties that build a sub property chain of a given property.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: propertyChainAxiom

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines that two given properties are disjoint.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: propertyDisjointWith

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the cardinality of an exact qualified cardinality restriction.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: qualifiedCardinality

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines that two given individuals are equal.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sameAs

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the class that an existential property restriction refers to.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: someValuesFrom

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the subject of a negative property assertion.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sourceIndividual

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the object of a negative object property assertion.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: targetIndividual

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the value of a negative data property assertion.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: targetValue

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The data property that relates every individual to every data value.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: topDataProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The object property that relates every two individuals.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: topObjectProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the collection of classes or data ranges that build a union.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: unionOf

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The property that determines the collection of facet-value pairs that define a datatype restriction.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: withRestrictions

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The subject is a subproperty of a property.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: subPropertyOf

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of container membership properties, rdf:_1, rdf:_2, ..., all of which are sub-properties of 'member'.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ContainerMembershipProperty

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A member of the subject resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: member

rdf:Description.dct:title: SKOS Vocabulary
rdf:Description.dct:contributor: Participants in W3C's Semantic Web Deployment Working Group.
rdf:Description.dct:description: An RDF vocabulary for describing the basic structure and content of concept schemes such as thesauri, classification schemes, subject heading lists, taxonomies, 'folksonomies', other types of controlled vocabulary, and also concept schemes embedded in glossaries and terminologies.
rdf:Description.dct:creator: Alistair Miles
Sean Bechhofer

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: definition
rdf:Description.skos:definition: A statement or formal explanation of the meaning of a concept.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Concept Scheme
rdf:Description.skos:definition: A set of concepts, optionally including statements about semantic relationships between those concepts.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: A concept scheme may be defined to include concepts from different sources.
rdf:Description.skos:example: Thesauri, classification schemes, subject heading lists, taxonomies, 'folksonomies', and other types of controlled vocabulary are all examples of concept schemes. Concept schemes are also embedded in glossaries and terminologies.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: scope note
rdf:Description.skos:definition: A note that helps to clarify the meaning and/or the use of a concept.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: example
rdf:Description.skos:definition: An example of the use of a concept.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Ordered Collection
rdf:Description.skos:definition: An ordered collection of concepts, where both the grouping and the ordering are meaningful.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Ordered collections can be used where you would like a set of concepts to be displayed in a specific order, and optionally under a 'node label'.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is in scheme
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a resource (for example a concept) to a concept scheme in which it is included.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: A concept may be a member of more than one concept scheme.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is top concept in scheme
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a concept to the concept scheme that it is a top level concept of.

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: skos:prefLabel, skos:altLabel and skos:hiddenLabel are pairwise disjoint properties.
The range of skos:hiddenLabel is the class of RDF plain literals.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: hidden label
rdf:Description.skos:definition: A lexical label for a resource that should be hidden when generating visual displays of the resource, but should still be accessible to free text search operations.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: notation
rdf:Description.skos:definition: A notation, also known as classification code, is a string of characters such as "T58.5" or "303.4833" used to uniquely identify a concept within the scope of a given concept scheme.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: By convention, skos:notation is used with a typed literal in the object position of the triple.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: note
rdf:Description.skos:definition: A general note, for any purpose.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: This property may be used directly, or as a super-property for more specific note types.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: change note
rdf:Description.skos:definition: A note about a modification to a concept.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: editorial note
rdf:Description.skos:definition: A note for an editor, translator or maintainer of the vocabulary.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: history note
rdf:Description.skos:definition: A note about the past state/use/meaning of a concept.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is in semantic relation with
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Links a concept to a concept related by meaning.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: This property should not be used directly, but as a super-property for all properties denoting a relationship of meaning between concepts.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has broader transitive
rdf:Description.skos:definition: skos:broaderTransitive is a transitive superproperty of skos:broader.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: By convention, skos:broaderTransitive is not used to make assertions. Rather, the properties can be used to draw inferences about the transitive closure of the hierarchical relation, which is useful e.g. when implementing a simple query expansion algorithm in a search application.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has narrower transitive
rdf:Description.skos:definition: skos:narrowerTransitive is a transitive superproperty of skos:narrower.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: By convention, skos:narrowerTransitive is not used to make assertions. Rather, the properties can be used to draw inferences about the transitive closure of the hierarchical relation, which is useful e.g. when implementing a simple query expansion algorithm in a search application.

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: skos:related is disjoint with skos:broaderTransitive
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has related
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a concept to a concept with which there is an associative semantic relationship.

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: For any resource, every item in the list given as the value of the skos:memberList property is also a value of the skos:member property.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has member list
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an ordered collection to the RDF list containing its members.

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: These concept mapping relations mirror semantic relations, and the data model defined below is similar (with the exception of skos:exactMatch) to the data model defined for semantic relations. A distinct vocabulary is provided for concept mapping relations, to provide a convenient way to differentiate links within a concept scheme from links between concept schemes. However, this pattern of usage is not a formal requirement of the SKOS data model, and relies on informal definitions of best practice.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is in mapping relation with
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates two concepts coming, by convention, from different schemes, and that have comparable meanings

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has broader match
rdf:Description.skos:definition: skos:broadMatch is used to state a hierarchical mapping link between two conceptual resources in different concept schemes.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has narrower match
rdf:Description.skos:definition: skos:narrowMatch is used to state a hierarchical mapping link between two conceptual resources in different concept schemes.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has related match
rdf:Description.skos:definition: skos:relatedMatch is used to state an associative mapping link between two conceptual resources in different concept schemes.

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: skos:exactMatch is disjoint with each of the properties skos:broadMatch and skos:relatedMatch.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has exact match
rdf:Description.skos:definition: skos:exactMatch is used to link two concepts, indicating a high degree of confidence that the concepts can be used interchangeably across a wide range of information retrieval applications. skos:exactMatch is a transitive property, and is a sub-property of skos:closeMatch.
